text: But discussion on current points of east-west conflict could not go much farther than, for example, the truism that policies of menace and mutual disarmament cannot be followed together. What the council has done - and it is an achievement - is to make religious contact across the greatest political barrier in what is not yet a unitary world.
handwritten_text: But discussion on current points of east-west conflict could not go much farther than, for example, the truism that policies of menace and mutual disarmament cannot be followed together. What the council has done - and it is an achievement - is to make religious contact across the greatest political barrier in what is not yet a unitary world.
